joining.waiverCondition: Spend ₹30,000 within first 90 days for first year fee waiver (promotional); or via special bank offers

renewalWaiver.waiverText: Spend ₹1,00,000 in 12 months and get Renewal Fee waived for next renewal year

latePayment.calculation: Tiered based on outstanding balance (effective August 2024)

rentPaymentFee.note: 1% fee on rent payments via CRED, PayTM, Cheq, MobiKwik, Freecharge etc, capped at ₹3000 (effective August 2024)

fuelOverLimitFee.note: 1% fee charged on entire amount if fuel transaction exceeds ₹15,000

utilityOverLimitFee.note: 1% fee charged on entire amount if utility transaction exceeds ₹50,000

additionalCharges.redemptionFeeNote: ₹50 for statement credit redemption, ₹99+GST for reward catalog redemption (effective August 2024)

existingRelationship.note: Easier approval for existing HDFC Bank customers

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, existing relationship with HDFC Bank, and repayment capacity
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history for 6+ months, updated income documents

gracePeriod.note: Up to 50 days interest-free period from date of purchase (subject to merchant submission)

minPayment.calculation: 5% of total outstanding or ₹200, whichever is higher

rewards.earningText: Earn 5% CashPoints on partner brands (Amazon, Flipkart, etc.), 1% on other eligible spends

categories: EMI transactions (including Smart EMI, even if preclosed)
Education payments via third-party apps (effective September 2024)
exclusions.note: From 1st September 2024, wallet loading, Easy EMI, and education payments won't earn Reward Points. Education payments directly through college/school websites or POS are still eligible.

acceleratedBrands.note: 5% CashPoints on partner brands capped at 1,000 CashPoints per statement cycle

otherSpends.note: 1% CashPoints on other spends capped at 1,000 CashPoints per statement cycle

expiry.condition: Unredeemed Reward Points expire/lapse after 2 years from date of accumulation

welcome.validity: On payment of joining membership fee
welcome.description: Welcome Benefit of 1000 CashPoints on payment of joining membership fee

renewal.condition: No CashPoints posting for renewal membership fee payments

partnerBrands.note: 5% CashPoints on transactions at these 10 partner brands, max 1,000 CashPoints per statement cycle

otherSpends.note: 1% CashPoints on all other eligible spends except excluded categories

walletLoads.note: No rewards on wallet loads (effective September 2024)

emi.note: No rewards on EMI transactions including Smart EMI

bankPortal.name: SmartBuy
bankPortal.note: 5% CashPoints on SmartBuy transactions (min ₹2,000), capped at 1,000 CashPoints per month

partnerMerchants.note: Partner brand rewards are already covered in base categories

redemption.monthlyRedemptionNote: CashPoints redemption for statement credit capped at 3,000 CashPoints per calendar month. W.e.f. 1st Feb 2026, redemption limited to max 5 times per month

pointsPlusPay.note: For flight/hotel bookings via SmartBuy, can redeem up to 50% of booking value through CashPoints

options.note: 1 CashPoint = ₹1. Redemption via NetBanking, Phone Banking, or physical form. ₹50 redemption fee applies.
1 CashPoint = ₹0.30 for travel bookings. Max 50% of booking value via CashPoints, rest via credit card. Monthly cap of 50,000 CashPoints for flights/hotels.

options.description: Gift vouchers from SmartBuy Rewards Catalogue
options.note: 1 CashPoint = ₹0.30 for catalog redemption. ₹99+GST handling charges apply.

transferPartners.note: Millennia Credit Card does not support point transfers to airline/hotel partners

pooling.note: CashPoints pooling not available for Millennia Credit Card

rewards.specialLogic: CashPoints posted on calendar month basis. Transactions settled between 1st to 30/31st of calendar month are posted in the subsequent month's first week.

calculator.formula: partnerBrandPoints = min(spendOnPartners * 0.05, 1000); otherPoints = min(otherSpend * 0.01, 1000); totalMonthlyPoints = partnerBrandPoints + otherPoints

spendRequired.note: Complimentary domestic lounge access discontinued effective December 1, 2023. Lounge access now available as part of Quarterly Spends Milestone program or on chargeable basis.

chargeableAccess.note: Can avail lounge access on chargeable basis by presenting the card at lounge

milestones.benefit: Choice of ₹1,000 gift voucher OR HOI domestic airport lounge access voucher
milestones.conditions: Spend ₹1,00,000 in a calendar quarter (Jan-Mar, Apr-Jun, Jul-Sep, Oct-Dec). Choose from BigBasket, BookMyShow, Pizza Hut, PVR vouchers OR DreamFolks/HOI lounge access. SMS/email sent within 7 days of quarter end. Claim within 60 days.
milestones.claimProcess: Click link in email to claim voucher from available brands

movies.note: No dedicated movie offers, but BookMyShow is a 5% CashPoints partner brand

programs.name: Swiggy Dineout
programs.note: Additional discount on dining via Swiggy Dineout

programs.name: Good Food Trail
programs.note: Dining privileges with Good Food Trail program

fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between ₹400 and ₹5,000. Maximum waiver ₹250 per statement cycle. Surcharge rate may vary depending on fuel station and acquiring bank.

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency

forex.note: Forex markup of 3.5% applies to all non-INR transactions. Not recommended for frequent international travelers.

concierge.note: Concierge service not available on Millennia Credit Card

noCostEMI.note: No-cost EMI available on select merchants and products

emi.note: SmartEMI option to convert big spends into EMI after purchase. EMI transactions do not earn CashPoints.

balanceTransfer.note: Transfer balances from other bank cards

lostCard.note: Zero lost card liability on fraudulent transactions when reported immediately

insurance.note: Millennia Credit Card is an entry-level card with limited insurance coverage. Zero lost card liability is the primary protection offered.

upiLinking.note: Can link to UPI apps. Wallet loading transactions do not earn rewards (effective September 2024).

upgradesTo.note: Can upgrade based on income increase and good credit history
Can upgrade based on income increase and good credit history

upgradePathway.note: Upgrade eligibility based on spend history, income, and relationship with HDFC Bank

meta.bestFor: Young professionals and millennials who frequently shop online on Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, and order food from Swiggy/Zomato. Ideal for monthly spends of ₹20,000-₹50,000 on partner brands.
meta.notRecommendedFor: High spenders (monthly caps limit benefit), frequent international travelers (high forex markup), those seeking lounge access (discontinued), fuel-heavy spenders (no rewards on fuel)
meta.verdict: HDFC Millennia is one of India's most popular entry-level cashback cards. The 5% CashPoints on 10 major lifestyle brands with 1:1 redemption makes it excellent value for online shoppers. However, the monthly caps (₹1,000 each for accelerated and non-accelerated categories), discontinued complimentary lounge access, and high forex markup are significant drawbacks. Best suited for moderate spenders who can consistently spend on partner brands and redeem as statement credit.
pros: 5% CashPoints on 10 popular lifestyle brands (Amazon, Flipkart, Swiggy, etc.)
1:1 redemption value for statement credit (1 CashPoint = ₹1)
Low annual fee with achievable waiver condition (₹1 lakh/year)
Wide partner brand coverage across shopping, food, entertainment, and commute
Available on Visa, Mastercard, and Diners platforms
cons: Monthly reward caps limit benefits for high spenders (max ₹2,000 CashPoints/month)
High forex markup (3.5%) - not suitable for international transactions
No rewards on fuel, rent, EMI, wallet loads, government payments
Low redemption value on SmartBuy (0.30/point vs 1.0/point for statement credit)
New redemption fees introduced (₹50 for statement credit, ₹99 for catalog)
dataSource: HDFC Bank Millennia Credit Card T&C document

changelog.change: Complimentary domestic lounge access discontinued; now part of quarterly milestone program
Wallet loading, Easy EMI, and education payments no longer earn Reward Points
New fee structure for rent payments (1% capped at ₹3,000), fuel over ₹15,000 (1%), utilities over ₹50,000 (1%). New redemption fees: ₹50 for statement credit, ₹99 for catalog
Monthly cap of 50,000 CashPoints for flight/hotel bookings via SmartBuy
Reward points redemption limited to maximum 5 times per month (upcoming)
